'''Chapters''' is the main story progression found within ''[[Minecraft Blast]]'' and can be found within the [[Journey (Blast)|journey]] screen. Chapters are linked with the [[Tasks (Blast)|tasks]], each chapter containing different tasks that correspond to the story. Completing all the tasks found within a chapter progresses the game into the next chapter.

== List of Chapters ==
{{cleanup}}
=== Chapter 1 ===
Chapter 1 follows the story of the [[Companion (Blast)|companion]] spawning into the Overworld and exploring around the area whilst mining, crafting and building themselves a home. Halfway the chapter, it turns nighttime and we enter a cutscene of the companion meeting their demise to a group of zombies after which the companion respawns and builds a bridge and meets a villager. The villager suggests tasks for the companion to do.

Completing chapter 1 will earn you:

* [[File:MCB emerald icon.png|20px]] 2000 Emeralds
* [[File:MCB heart icon.png|20px]] Infinite Hearts for 15 minutes
* [[File:MCB rocket icon.png|20px]] 3 Rockets
* [[File:MCB tnt icon.png|20px]] 3 TNT
* [[File:MCB end crystal icon.png|20px]] 3 End Crystals
* [[File:MCB pickaxe icon.png|20px]] 1 Pickaxe

=== Chapter 2 ===
In chapter 2, the companion suggests the villager could use a castle, a fortress or a palazzo but the villagers seem to not want any of these and suggests that they build a farm next. The companion then suggests an animal wellness retreat and the villager agrees. They then travel to a new area to build a farm for the villager's village.

Completing chapter 2 will earn you:

* [[File:MCB emerald icon.png|20px]] 2000 Emeralds
* [[File:MCB heart icon.png|20px]] Infinite Hearts for 15 minutes
* [[File:MCB rocket icon.png|20px]] 3 Rockets
* [[File:MCB tnt icon.png|20px]] 3 TNT
* [[File:MCB end crystal icon.png|20px]] 3 End Crystals
* [[File:MCB shovel icon.png|20px]] 1 Shovel

=== Chapter 3 ===
In chapter 3, the companion enjoys building a farm for the villager's village and hears the sounds of the ocean. The day turns to night, and the companion heads off to the beach. There we are introduced to Blockbeard the pirate where we find his ship wrecked onto a nearby island. The companion then suggests building a lighthouse to Blockbeard to prevent anymore shipwrecks from happening, Blockbeard then agrees but warns of potential bloodthirsty sharks lurking around (which in reality are just a group of turtles).

Completing chapter 3 will earn you:

* [[File:MCB emerald icon.png|20px]] 2000 Emeralds
* [[File:MCB heart icon.png|20px]] Infinite Hearts for 15 minutes
* [[File:MCB rocket icon.png|20px]] 3 Rockets
* [[File:MCB tnt icon.png|20px]] 3 TNT
* [[File:MCB end crystal icon.png|20px]] 3 End Crystals
* [[File:MCB sword icon.png|20px]] 1 Sword

=== Chapter 4 ===
Not much is known about chapter 4 but it can be seen being teased within the journey screen. Completing all the chapters shows the player a "Completed!" pop-up screen which shows artwork of the chicken with a question mark above it looking at what appears to be a Nether portal.
